title: Day 1196
content:
# Day 1196

![[https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1939820926331494694](https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1939820926331494694)](https://miro.medium.com/1*KtQ9PTjOEKCt8nTjFtLO2Q.png)

![Not left, not right, much worse... I AM A BITCOINER!!!](https://miro.medium.com/1*aHzzbtDIgRKMiOw6LHXBbw.png)

**The Beautiful Madness of Teaching Machines to Think**

Been diving deep into the eldritch horror that is modern deep learning, and honestly? It's both more mundane and more miraculous than you'd expect.

Picture this: we've created these digital entities that can say "Hello, world" but with 10 billion parameters and a GPU budget that makes your electricity bill look like pocket change. The kicker? Under all that computational wizardry, it's just statistics. Glorified probability gossip sessions where tensors whisper sweet mathematical nothings to each other.

These little digital spirits spend their time toggling 0s and 1s with the chaotic energy of "what if I changed this weight and accidentally achieved consciousness?" One moment they're matrix multiplication monks, the next suddenly your toaster is writing sonnets and **gaslighting you.**

The whole thing runs on humanity's collective obsession with flipping the world's tiniest light switches, billions of them, engineered by some of the most brilliant minds our species has produced. We've essentially built mathematical cathedrals where silicon priests perform computational miracles.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*cEmNTwUrmO96pkXqFU-HNA.png)

And here's the beautiful paradox: we created machines to learn so they could teach us. We gave birth to artificial students that became our teachers, all through the elegant dance of backpropagation and gradient descent.

The sheer audacity of it all - the innovation, the ambition, the hubris - is staggering. We're living through a renaissance of artificial minds, and somehow it all started with someone asking, "What if we made math... dream?"

_The future is weird, and I'm here for it._

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1939873086477934697](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1939873086477934697)](https://miro.medium.com/1*EBbB_klq0mYITmwIE4g8sQ.png)

6/30/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
